sentences.en: Teachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 教师们将被要求填写一份调查问卷。

sentences.en: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.cn: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.en: Does it matter what I think?
sentences.cn: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.en: Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.cn: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.en: Clare’s my tennis partner.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔是我的网球搭档。

sentences.en: Take your partners for the next dance.
sentences.cn: 挑选下一支舞的舞伴吧。

phrases.cn: 商业伙伴，业务合作伙伴；买卖的合伙人

sentences.en: Regular exercise is part of a healthy lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 经常锻炼身体是健康生活方式的一部分。

sentences.en: No, that’s the difference between a good and a bad shepherd.
sentences.cn: 不。 这是一个好牧羊人和一个坏牧羊人之间的差别。

sentences.en: The Dead Sea scrolls were found by a shepherd pursuing a stray goat into a cave.
sentences.cn: 《死海经卷》是一个牧羊人到山洞寻找一只离群的山羊时发现的。

phrases.cn: 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬；德国警犬（等于German police dog）
n. 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬

sentences.en: We had a peaceful afternoon without the children.
sentences.cn: 孩子们不在，我们度过了一个宁静的下午。

sentences.en: It’s very peaceful out here in the woods.
sentences.cn: 这树林里真安静。

sentences.en: a relaxing evening at home
sentences.cn: 在家里度过的一个轻松的夜晚

phrases.cn: 放松自己；放松某人自己

sentences.en: Moving to a new house is a very stressful experience.
sentences.cn: 搬新家是件很劳心的事。

sentences.en: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
sentences.cn: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.en: (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.
sentences.cn: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

sentences.en: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.cn: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.en: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.cn: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.en: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.cn: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

phrases.cn: 时间序列分析；时序分析

sentences.en: cartoon characters such as Donald Duck
sentences.cn: 唐老鸭一类的卡通人物

phrases.cn: 卡通频道；卡通电视网（美国一个专门播放动画节目的有线电视频道）

sentences.en: a talk show host
sentences.cn: 脱口秀节目主持人

sentences.en: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.cn: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.en: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.cn: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.en: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.cn: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

sentences.en: Tom offered to sleep on the couch.
sentences.cn: 汤姆说他来睡沙发。

phrases.cn: 在沙发上；[美口]接受心理分析
成天躺著或坐在沙发上看电视的人；极为懒惰的人

sentences.en: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

sentences.en: The concert will be broadcast live by the BBC.
sentences.cn: 这场音乐会将由英国广播公司实况转播。

sentences.en: a portable radio
sentences.cn: 便携式收音机

phrases.cn: 便携设备，手提设备；移动式设备

sentences.en: a remote border town
sentences.cn: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.en: a fire in a remote mountain area
sentences.cn: 偏远山区的火灾

sentences.en: Eighteen percent of 30-year-olds claim they are workaholics.
sentences.cn: 18％的30岁的人声称他们是工作狂。

sentences.en: Police work involves so much paperwork these days.
sentences.cn: 如今当警察也要做这么多文书工作。

sentences.en: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.cn: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.en: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.cn: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.en: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.cn: 精密的警报系统

sentences.en: Then the fire alarm went off. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.cn: 之后火警响了，我只抓起衣服就跑了出去。

sentences.en: Maria and I want your life to be filled with both.
sentences.cn: 玛利亚和我希望你的生活充满幸运和幸福。

sentences.en: In doing so you will become a more productive problem solver, and a much happier person as your reality will be filled with glasses that are half full.
sentences.cn: 通过做这些，你将会成为一个更有成效的难题解决者，和一个更快乐的人，因为你原本只有半杯满的现实将被充实填满。

sentences.en: He was in urgent need of medical attention.
sentences.cn: 他急需治疗。

sentences.en: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.cn: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.en: an urgent message
sentences.cn: 一封急报

sentences.en: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.cn: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

sentences.en: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.cn: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.en: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.cn: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.en: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.cn: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

phrases.cn: n. 夜半太阳（夏季在南极或北极能见到）

sentences.en: He was easily bored.
sentences.cn: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.en: After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

phrases.cn: 螺旋钻孔桩；填充桩；螺旋桩

sentences.en: Your headaches are due to stress.
sentences.cn: 你的头痛是压力造成的。

sentences.en: Janet’s been under a lot of stress since her mother’s illness.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特自从母亲生病以来承受了很大的压力。

sentences.en: all the stresses of public life
sentences.cn: 公众生活的所有压力

sentences.en: a TV studio
sentences.cn: 电视演播室

sentences.en: a recording studio in Nashville
sentences.cn: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.en: ...a yoga expert.
sentences.cn: …一位瑜伽专家。

sentences.en: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.cn: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.en: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.cn: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

sentences.en: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.cn: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.en: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.cn: 你绝不能屈从压力。

phrases.cn: 面临压力，在压力之下；受到压力

sentences.en: social issues, such as unemployment and education
sentences.cn: 失业和教育之类的社会问题

sentences.en: the country’s serious social problems
sentences.cn: 该国严重的社会问题

sentences.en: a challenge to the social order
sentences.cn: 对社会秩序的一个挑战

sentences.en: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.cn: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.en: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.cn: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.en: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

sentences.en: How do you organise your plant to sustain this safety?
sentences.cn: 你如何组织你的电站使它能保持安全？

sentences.en: The question is how to organise such a discussion effectively.
sentences.cn: 问题是如何有效地组织这样一个讨论。

sentences.en: Lyn always seems to be on a diet.
sentences.cn: 琳恩似乎一直在节食。

sentences.en: a salt-free diet
sentences.cn: 无盐饮食

sentences.en: Not all diets are good for you.
sentences.cn: 不是所有的节食方法都适合你。

sentences.en: This type of owl prefers a desert habitat.
sentences.cn: 这种猫头鹰更喜欢沙漠的生活环境。

sentences.en: She prefers her coffee black.
sentences.cn: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

sentences.en: the government’s preferred option
sentences.cn: 政府倾向的选择

phrases.cn: 宁可做某事；更喜欢做某事

sentences.en: I can’t stand bad manners.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍没有礼貌。

sentences.en: I know he can’t stand the sight of me.
sentences.cn: 我知道他不喜欢看到我。

sentences.en: I can’t stand people smoking around me when I’m eating.
sentences.cn: 我受不了吃饭时有人在我旁边抽烟。

phrases.cn: v. 站起来；坚持；竖立；站得住脚；拥护
坚持；依靠；位于；拘泥于；[航]持续向同一方向航行

sentences.en: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.cn: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.en: When the boys graduated from high school, Ann moved to a small town in Vermont.
sentences.cn: 男孩们中学毕业后安迁到了佛蒙特州的一座小镇。

sentences.en: ‘Any minus points ?’ ‘Well, the engine is rather noisy.’
sentences.cn: “有什么毛病吗？”“嗯，发动机噪音很大。”

sentences.en: On the minus side, there is no free back-up service if things go wrong.
sentences.cn: 不足之处是出了问题没有免费的技术支持服务。

phrases.cn: 关闭一声部模式；零下一度

sentences.en: a wash basin
sentences.cn: 洗脸盆

phrases.cn: 塔里木盆地（位于中国西部）

sentences.en: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.cn: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

phrases.cn: 接受挑战，奋起应付挑战

sentences.en: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.cn: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.en: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.cn: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

sentences.en: I think I dialed the wrong number.
sentences.cn: 我想我拨错号码了。

phrases.cn: 转盘电话机；自动电话（等于dial phone）

sentences.en: The new plane is in its final design stage.
sentences.cn: 这种新型飞机正处于最后的设计阶段。

sentences.en: the design process
sentences.cn: 设计过程

sentences.en: the design team
sentences.cn: 设计团队

sentences.en: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.cn: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.en: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.cn: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.en: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.cn: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

phrases.cn: 口头报告；口头陈述；口头演讲
n. 演讲技巧；表达技巧

sentences.en: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.cn: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.en: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.cn: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.en: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.cn: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.en: The accountant disputes the figures you gave him .
sentences.cn: 会计师对你提供的数字提出质疑。

sentences.en: Do you want me to invite your accountant to this meeting?
sentences.cn: 你想让我把你的会计师也邀请到会议里么？

phrases.cn: 总会计师；会计主任，会计处长

sentences.en: a tube station
sentences.cn: 地铁站

sentences.en: a crowded room
sentences.cn: 拥挤的房间

sentences.en: a crowded street
sentences.cn: 拥挤的街道

sentences.en: The train was very crowded, and we had to stand.
sentences.cn: 火车很挤，我们只好站着。

sentences.en: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton.
sentences.cn: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.en: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.cn: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.en: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.cn: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

sentences.en: You’ll have to go now, otherwise you’ll miss your bus.
sentences.cn: 你现在就得走，要不然就赶不上公共汽车了。

sentences.en: Put your coat on, otherwise you’ll get cold.
sentences.cn: 穿上外套，不然你会着凉的。

sentences.en: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.en: A vast crowd gathered in the main square.
sentences.cn: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.en: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.cn: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.en: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.cn: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.en: Smoking can cause lung cancer.
sentences.cn: 吸烟会引起肺癌。

sentences.en: an insurance policy against long-term sickness and injury
sentences.cn: 保长期患病和受伤的保险单

sentences.en: working days lost due to sickness
sentences.cn: 因病损失的工作日

phrases.cn: [医]晕动病（指晕船、晕车、晕飞机）
孕妇晨吐；孕妇怀孕初期的反应

sentences.en: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.cn: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.en: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.cn: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.en: He was smoking a big cigar.
sentences.cn: 他在抽一只大雪茄。

sentences.en: The question is: if that node is not actually being displayed at the moment, where should it be displayed?
sentences.cn: 问题是：如果此刻实际上并没有显示那个节点，那么应该在哪里显示它？

sentences.en: The council conducted a survey of the uses to which farm buildings are put.
sentences.cn: 该委员会对农场建筑的用途进行了一个调查。

phrases.cn: n. 实地调查；实地考察

sentences.en: the classical theory of relativity
sentences.cn: 经典相对论

sentences.en: Stop flaunting your mini-skirt, you are flaunting your underwear at the same time.
sentences.cn: 别再炫耀你的迷你裙了，你连你的内裤都一起炫耀了。

sentences.en: Like wearing mini-skirt, sentences in speech or writing should be the shorter, the better.
sentences.cn: 也有人打趣的说：「讲演或写作的句子，就像穿迷你裙，愈短愈好。」

sentences.en: Lydia always comes to work in a—mini-skirt and high heels.
sentences.cn: 莉蒂雅总是穿着性感迷你裙和高跟鞋来上班。

sentences.en: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.cn: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.en: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.cn: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.en: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.cn: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

sentences.en: He cycled to Ingwold.
sentences.cn: 他骑车去了英格沃尔德。

sentences.en: In fact any ability resulting from practice and cultivation could accurately be said to embody kung fu.
sentences.cn: 实际上任何从实践和修养得来的能力都可被准确地视作包含了功夫在内。

sentences.en: The fat panda dreams of becoming a kung fu warrior.
sentences.cn: 那个胖熊猫的梦想是成为一名功夫勇士。

sentences.en: an attempt to use Japanese management style in a European business
sentences.cn: 将日本的管理方式用于欧洲企业的尝试

phrases.cn: 生活方式，生活习惯；格调

sentences.en: Glen was calm and composed at the funeral.
sentences.cn: 格伦在葬礼上表现得平静而镇定。

sentences.en: a generous glass of wine
sentences.cn: 一大杯葡萄酒

sentences.en: the increase in violent crime
sentences.cn: 暴力犯罪的增多

sentences.en: violent clashes between the police and demonstrators
sentences.cn: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.en: 31 people have been injured in violent incidents throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 今天一天有31人在暴力事件中受伤。

sentences.en: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.cn: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.en: Children grow up with a mixture of character traits (= character qualities ) from both sides of their family.
sentences.cn: 儿童在成长过程中会把父母亲双方的性格特点都继承下来。

sentences.en: his temper and other character flaws
sentences.cn: 他的火爆脾气和其他性格缺陷

sentences.en: a Chinese province
sentences.cn: 中国的一个省

sentences.en: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.cn: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.en: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

sentences.en: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

sentences.en: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.cn: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.en: There are only three flights a day to Logan Airport from Heathrow.
sentences.cn: 希思罗机场每天只有三趟飞往洛根机场的航班。

phrases.cn: n. 飞行控制；飞行指挥

sentences.en: a new product launch
sentences.cn: 新产品的推出

sentences.en: the force of gravity
sentences.cn: 重力

sentences.en: The rocket was launched from a space research base.
sentences.cn: 火箭从一个太空研究基地发射升空。

sentences.en: a space rocket
sentences.cn: 航天火箭

phrases.cn: n. 火箭发动机；火箭引擎
火箭发射装置，火箭发射器；火箭筒，火箭发射车

sentences.en: Her temperature soared.
sentences.cn: 她的体温骤然升高。

sentences.en: Second, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from hunger and disease.
sentences.cn: 其次，联合国的使命要求把人们从饥饿和疾病中解放出来。

sentences.en: Finally, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from poverty and despair.
sentences.cn: 最后，联合国的使命要求把人民从贫困与绝望中解放出来。

sentences.en: First, the mission of the United Nations requires liberating people from tyranny and violence.
sentences.cn: 首先，联合国的使命要求把人们从暴政和暴力下解放出来。

sentences.en: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.cn: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.en: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.cn: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

sentences.en: You can peacefully send her on to the next life.
sentences.cn: 你可以心情平静地把卡西送往另一个世界。

sentences.en: We want to get to Western standards of living, but to do it all peacefully.
sentences.cn: 我们希望达到西方的生活标准，但是一切要和平地进行。

sentences.en: a news reporter
sentences.cn: 新闻记者

sentences.en: The bedside lamp glowed dimly.
sentences.cn: 床头灯发出暗淡的光。

sentences.en: The fireplace was still glowing with the remains of last night’s fire.
sentences.cn: 壁炉中，隔夜的余烬依然在微微发光。

sentences.en: The red tip of his cigarette was glowing in the dark.
sentences.cn: 他那红红的烟头在黑暗中幽幽发光。

phrases.cn: 预热塞，电热塞；热线点火塞

sentences.en: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.cn: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.en: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.cn: 家里的气氛很紧张。

phrases.cn: n. 学业风气，学习氛围

sentences.en: a parachute jump
sentences.cn: 跳伞

sentences.en: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.cn: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.en: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.cn: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.cn: 她肯定地说她看到他把那架直升飞机降落到了玉米地里。

sentences.en: By far his favourite invention was the record player. His other famous invention was the light bulb.
sentences.cn: 他最中意的发明是录音机，他另一个著名的发明是电灯泡。

sentences.en: When you suddenly you see a bright light like the sun or a light bulb then you feel like you are going to sneeze.
sentences.cn: 当你突然看到类似于太阳 或者电灯泡所发出的一束强光时， 你会觉得好像有种打喷嚏的冲动。

sentences.en: In this way the light bulb requests an address block from the light switch, the light switch in turn from the electrical system which in turn requests one from the room/floor controller.
sentences.cn: 依照这种方式, 电灯泡会向电灯开关申请一个地址段, 而电灯开关则会向其上级的电力系统转交申请, 电力系统则将申请转交给该房间/该层的控制器.

sentences.en: When choosing an insurance policy it’s best to get an independent opinion.
sentences.cn: 选择保险时，最好听听专家的独立意见。

phrases.cn: adv. 依我看来，在我看来

sentences.en: Personally, I don’t think much of the idea.
sentences.cn: 就个人而言，我认为这个主意不怎么样。

sentences.cn: 1987年的飓风是英格兰数十年来遭遇的最为严重的自然灾害。

sentences.en: To Americans,being on one's own suggests that one is a fully independent and functioning part of the whole capable and willing to make choices.
sentences.cn: 译文 对美国人而言，依靠自己的力量就是指这个人作为整体的一部分是完全独立并能起作用的，他有能力也愿意做出选择。

sentences.en: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.

sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队已放弃了两名潜水员生还的全部希望。

sentences.cn: 每个人都很关心他是否能恢复健康。

sentences.en: It is only our determination to fight that has pulled us through.

sentences.cn: 说他撒谎，他非常生气。

sentences.en: You have to react quickly to circumstances.

sentences.en: About the origin of the Mid Autumn Festival is not a.
sentences.cn: 有关中秋节的由来众说不一。

sentences.en: According to astronomy, the Mid Autumn Festival occurs at the autumn equinox.
sentences.cn: 根据天文学，中秋节是秋分之时。

sentences.en: This was known as autumn reward. Since the 15'" month of the 8th month is the time when rice paddies are harvested, some people believe that the Mid Autumn Festival came from the autumn reward ritual.
sentences.cn: 到了秋天，人们会再次祭祀土地之神，感谢他给予人们丰收，这就是著名的秋日祭祀，因为阴历8月15日是水稻成熟之时，所以有些人认为中秋节是从秋日祭祀仪式演变而来的。

sentences.cn: 她正忙着筹备女儿的婚礼。

phrases.cn: 举行婚礼的日子；结婚纪念日

sentences.en: It is small dumpling balls made of glutinousrice flour with rose petals, sesame, bean paste, jujube paste, walnut meat, dried fruit, sugar and edible oil as filling.
sentences.cn: “元宵”还有另外一个名字—汤圆，用糯米粉做皮，玫瑰花瓣、芝麻、豆酱、枣泥、胡桃肉、干果、糖和食用油做馅，做成的小面球团。

sentences.en: Fillings may be sweet with skinless mung beans, red bean paste and dates, or savory with Chinese sausage, barbecue pork, mushrooms, chestnuts, seafood, eggs and so on. Each flavor tastes delicious.
sentences.cn: 就口味而言，有绿豆馅、红豆馅、枣泥馅、腊肠馅、腊肉馅、蘑菇馅、栗子馅、海味馅、蛋黄馅等，各具特色，美味十足。

sentences.en: Don’t worry though; there are no surprises in Zongzi. They are just rice with either meat or sweet red bean paste wrapped inside.
sentences.cn: 不过别担心，粽子里面没什么特别的东西，只是米饭包着肉或豆沙而已。

sentences.en: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.cn: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.en: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.cn: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

sentences.cn: 你把这灯笼点起来，带着它下楼去。

sentences.cn: 一个平平常常的南瓜变成了一个充满光亮的灯笼。

sentences.en: In the course of time, this kind of lantern has become an exclusive of the Shens.

sentences.cn: 如果外部客户端通过向应用程序发送消息来参与应用程序处理，同步服务和异步接收将尤为有用。

sentences.en: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.cn: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

sentences.en: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.cn: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.en: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.cn: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

sentences.en: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.cn: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

phrases.cn: 退隐，沉默；(沉湎于自己的思想而)离群索居

sentences.en: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.cn: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

sentences.en: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.cn: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

phrases.cn: 减少对…之消耗量；努力，致力于…

sentences.en: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.cn: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

sentences.en: a TV sex education series aimed at teenagers
sentences.cn: 一部针对青少年的性教育电视系列片

sentences.en: Many years ago there lived an Emperor who laid so great a value upon new clothes that he spent all his money on them in order to be smartly dressed.
sentences.cn: 很久很久以前，有一位皇帝，他是如此的看重新衣服，以至于把他所有的钱都花在上面，以使得自己能穿得潇洒漂亮。

sentences.en: The Sergeant threw the frayed sheaf of football-pool coupons aside and snatched the radio. He saluted smartly, his huge belly juggling like a water gourd.
sentences.cn: 警官将凌乱的足球彩票扔到一边抓起了对话机，他潇洒地敬了个礼，巨大的肚子晃得就像一个水葫芦。

sentences.en: We must bestir ourselves to get there on time.
sentences.cn: 我们得尽量按时到达那里。

sentences.en: The timer in the TV would spring your TV on time.
sentences.cn: 电视机内的定时器可以准时启动打开电视机。

sentences.en: If you can't arrive there on time, you should warn them.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能按时到达，应该预先通知他们。

sentences.en: He had left a huge bunch of flowers in her hotel room.
sentences.cn: 他在她的宾馆房间里留了一大束花。

sentences.en: letters of congratulation
sentences.cn: 祝贺信

sentences.en: Guests toasted the bride and groom with champagne.
sentences.cn: 客人们以香槟为新娘新郎敬酒。

sentences.en: Take me for thy bridegroom, for I love thee.
sentences.cn: 让我作你的新郎吧。 因为我爱你。

sentences.en: Many gifts were showered on the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.cn: 人们纷纷给新娘和新郎送贺礼。

sentences.en: Jesus answered, "How can the guests of the bridegroom mourn while he is with them?
sentences.cn: 耶稣对他们说，新郎和陪伴之人同在的时候，陪伴之人岂能哀恸呢。

sentences.en: Do believe there is no best man, only much suitable one.
sentences.cn: 要相信没有最好的男人，只有更适合的。

sentences.en: Freddie was Keith's best man and his friends Eric, Billy, and Andrew were the groomsmen.
sentences.cn: 弗雷迪是基斯的伴郎，他的朋友埃里克，比利，安德鲁是男傧相。

sentences.en: a wedding ceremony
sentences.cn: 婚礼

sentences.en: the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games
sentences.cn: 奥运会开幕式

phrases.cn: 开学典礼；开幕式；开幕仪式；开幕典礼

sentences.en: the station entrance
sentences.cn: 车站的入口处

phrases.cn: 大门，正门入口；主要入口

sentences.en: They were always dropping by, usually without invitation.
sentences.cn: 他们常常来串门，通常不请自来。

sentences.en: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.cn: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.en: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.cn: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.en: All of us ought to go.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都应该去。

sentences.en: I think I ought to cut in on what they are doing.
sentences.cn: 我认为对他们现在干的事我应当进行干预。

sentences.en: You ought to be ashamed of your foolish behaviour.
sentences.cn: 你应当为自己的愚蠢行为而感到羞耻。

sentences.en: Stress is a contributing factor in many illnesses.
sentences.cn: 压力是许多疾病的致病因素。

sentences.en: Greek yoghurt
sentences.cn: 希腊式酸奶

phrases.cn: 古典希腊；古典希腊语（指公元前5和4世纪古典雅文学中使用的希腊语）

sentences.en: Can she retain her Wimbledon crown?
sentences.cn: 她能保住温布尔登的冠军宝座吗？

sentences.en: He went on to win the world crown in 2001.
sentences.cn: 他接着在2001年又赢得了世界冠军称号。

phrases.cn: 更妙的是；更糟糕的是；尤其是

sentences.en: little girls with ribbons in their hair
sentences.cn: 头发上系着丝带的小姑娘们

sentences.en: a bundle of letters tied with pale blue ribbon
sentences.cn: 一捆用淡蓝色丝带扎好的信

sentences.en: The ribbon was cut and the new station was officially open.
sentences.cn: 剪彩后，新车站正式开始运营。

phrases.cn: 蓝带程序；最高的荣誉；一流的

sentences.en: He walked with her, linking arms (= putting his arm around her arm ).
sentences.cn: 他与她挽臂同行。

sentences.en: The singing of Christmas carols is a custom derived from early dance routines of pagan origin.
sentences.cn: 唱圣诞歌这一传统源自异教早期的舞蹈仪式。

phrases.cn: 股票市场；证券市场；股票交易

sentences.en: It’s time we talked seriously about our relationship.
sentences.cn: 我们该认真谈一谈我们的关系了。

sentences.en: a telephone pole
sentences.cn: 电话线杆

phrases.cn: 增长极；增长点；发展轴心

sentences.en: envelopes and stamps
sentences.cn: 信封和邮票

sentences.en: She tore open the envelope and frantically read the letter.
sentences.cn: 她撕开信封慌忙看信。

sentences.en: He got a job stuffing envelopes (= filling them with letters ) at the campaign headquarters.
sentences.cn: 他找了一份在竞选总部装信封的工作。

sentences.en: There was a calendar on the wall above, with large squares around the dates.
sentences.cn: 墙的上方曾有一本日历，日期框在大方格里。

sentences.en: Protesters have been putting up barricades across a number of major intersections.
sentences.cn: 抗议者们已在许多主要十字路口搭建了路障。

sentences.en: Christmas decorations
sentences.cn: 圣诞节装饰物

sentences.en: cake decorations
sentences.cn: 蛋糕上的裱花

sentences.en: chocolate pudding
sentences.cn: 巧克力布丁

phrases.cn: 圣诞布丁（一种干果布丁）

sentences.en: Dick cradled her photograph against his breast.
sentences.cn: 迪克把她的照片轻轻拥在胸前。

sentences.en: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.cn: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.en: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.cn: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

sentences.en: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子觉得与大人很难谈得来。

sentences.en: The assistant carried on talking.
sentences.cn: 那个助理接着谈了下去。

sentences.en: Her bravery has given him the will to carry on with his life and his work.
sentences.cn: 她的勇气激发了他继续生活和工作下去的意愿。

sentences.en: His eldest son Joseph carried on his father's traditions.
sentences.cn: 长子约瑟夫继承了他父亲的传统。

sentences.en: He marched off, whistling a merry tune.
sentences.cn: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

sentences.en: He’s a lovely man with merry eyes and a wide smile.
sentences.cn: 他是个讨人喜欢的人，眼睛喜盈盈的，笑容满面。

sentences.en: the new Shakespeare production at the Arts Theatre
sentences.cn: 艺术剧院新排演的莎士比亚戏剧

sentences.en: She carried hypodermic needles and syringes in her bag.
sentences.cn: 她包里带着皮下注射针和针筒。

sentences.en: Drug users are at risk when they share needles.
sentences.cn: 吸毒者共用注射针很危险。

phrases.cn: 如坐针毡；焦躁不安；手脚发麻
[美国俚语]注射毒品的，有毒瘾的

sentences.en: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.cn: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

phrases.cn: 开口式枕套；无边式枕套

sentences.en: She can play tennis as well as basketball.
sentences.cn: 她也会打篮球，也会打网球。

sentences.en: If he winks at you,you may wink back as well.
sentences.cn: 如果他向你使眼色的话，你也可以使眼色以示回答。

sentences.en: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.cn: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

sentences.en: Fry the potatoes, covered, for about 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 盖上盖，将马铃薯煎20分钟左右。

sentences.en: I could smell onions frying.
sentences.cn: 我闻到了煎洋葱的味道。

phrases.cn: 无足轻重的人；不重要的

sentences.en: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

sentences.en: What a mess!
sentences.cn: 太乱了！

sentences.en: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.cn: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.en: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.cn: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。
